entries.title: Forgetful Week
entries.summary: Pranjul apologizes for a late diary entry, plans to take notes immediately after reading or watching to improve recall, and shares updates on manga (Vinland Saga, Welcome to Demon School! Iruma-kun), anime (Kaguya-Sama: Love is War), and a Studio Ghibli movie (Whisper of the Heart). They’re also working on headers, a pomodoro timer, and preparing their first blog, promising a proper Sunday update next time.

entries.title: Love, Duty, and Late-Night Sharbat
entries.summary: Revisited Gunahon Ka Devta, diving into Chandar and Sudha’s emotional turmoil, started blogging with notes, explored To Be Hero X’s unique animation, and reflected on societal pressures in relationships.
